page.title: 10A VISIT FROM THE MAYOR
page.content: Mr Porter came to our school on Tuesday to answer some questions for the Domesday project. Mr Porter has been mayor three times,twice when Andover had its own mayor and once mayor of Test Valley. Test Valley was formed in 1974. To become mayor you have to be voted for by the citizens then selected by the council. Mr Porter told us the town badge is a lion infront of an oak tree because that was the badge of the Earl of Leicester. The Earl could grant Andover anything by asking the queen.
